title: AyakaMains
description:
Welcome to the Kamisato House, Ayaka Mains Community Server

A friendly server for people who shares a common appreciation for Kamisato Ayaka, a cryo character from the Kamisato Clan in Inazuma.

Make yourself at home and we will grab the tea for you. We welcome anyone to stay, even just for the culture of our server and not just only about Ayaka.
